https://icsd.fiz-karlsruhe.de/search/dbinfo.xhtml

Personally, I found that splitting the queries into groups of 30 materials works better on the web version of the ICSD.
One by one, copy the lines above the 'Custom File Name' information into the 'ICSD Collection Code' field.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Alternatively, you can also try to query all the materials at once.
